Package Library.Medium

Class Medium

java.lang.Object
Library.Medium.Medium
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Medium>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Book, CD, ElectronicalMedium, Paper
public abstract class Medium extends Object implements Comparable<Medium>, Serializable
This class is used as a template for all storage mediums
